afk.example:
> *AFK Upayogam:*
- AFK set cheyyan: *afk [reason]*
- Udaharanam: *afk Njan busy aanu* Last seen #lastseen munpu
- Oru message ayakkunnathil AFK status automatically remove avum
- AFK off cheyyan: *afk off*
afk.desc: AFK (Away From Keyboard) status set cheyan

alive.desc: Bot-inte alive status message display cheyan. Optional custom text add cheyyam.

antifake.example:
*Antifake Status:* {0}

> *Command Upayogam:*
- *antifake list* - Ippolulla mode and codes kanan
- *antifake allow 1,91* - Whitelist Mode: codes allow cheyyan, bakki ellam block cheyyan
- *antifake disallow 92,93* - Blacklist Mode: codes block cheyyan, bakki ellam allow cheyyan
- *antifake remove 91* - List-il ninnu code remove cheyyan
- *antifake clear* - Ellaa codes clear cheythu disable cheyyan
- *antifake on | off* - Enable/Disable cheyyan

> *Note:* Whitelist and blacklist modes onnakkan pattilla. Mode maattan vendi `clear` upayogikkuka.
antifake.desc: Anti-fake number enable cheyan (whitelist or blacklist mode)
antifake.allow_prompt:
*Allow cheyyan vendi country codes thanne ittu (whitelist mode)*
_Udaharanam: antifake allow 1,91_
antifake.disallow_prompt:
*Disallow cheyyan vendi country codes thanne ittu (blacklist mode)*
_Udaharanam: antifake disallow 92,93_
antifake.remove_prompt:
*Remove cheyyan vendi country codes thanne ittu*
_Udaharanam: antifake remove 91_
antifake.mode_conflict_whitelist:
*âš ï¸ Modes onnakkan pattilla!*

_Ningal ippol Blacklist Mode-il aanu. Whitelist Mode-il maattan vendi `antifake clear` first upayogikkuka._
antifake.mode_conflict_blacklist:
*âš ï¸ Modes onnakkan pattilla!*

_Ningal ippol Whitelist Mode-il aanu. Blacklist Mode-il maattan vendi `antifake clear` first upayogikkuka._

antilink.example:

- antilink list - Ippolulla settings kanan
- antilink allow whatsapp.com - Specific URLs allow cheyyan
- antilink disallow facebook.com - Specific URLs disallow cheyyan
- antilink clear allow - Allowed URLs clear cheyyan
- antilink clear disallow - Disallowed URLs clear cheyyan
- antilink on | off - Antilink enable/disable cheyyan
- antilink kick | warn | null - Link-inu action set cheyyan

greet.setexample: > *Udaharanam:* setgreet Hi, ithu oru bot aanu. Enikku reply cheyyan time edukkum.

greetings.welcome_example:
Welcome ippol *{0}*

> *Upayogam Udaharanam:*
- welcome Hi &mention! Welcome to &name - Welcome message set cheyyan
- welcome on | off - Enable/Disable cheyyan
- welcome delete - Message delete cheyyan

> *Placeholders:*
- &mention - Puthiya member mention cheyyan
- &name - Group name
- &desc - Group description
- &size - Member count
- &pp - Member's profile picture

> *Media:* Image/video-inu reply ittu OR message-il URL add cheyyan

Details-inu: https://levanter-delta.vercel.app/
greetings.welcome_not_set:
_First welcome message set cheyyan!_

> *Udaharanam:*
welcome Hi &mention! Welcome to &name

Pinne upayogikkuka: welcome on

- goodbye delete - Message delete cheyyan

> *Placeholders:*
- &mention - Leaving member mention cheyyan
- &name - Group name
- &desc - Group description
- &size - Member count
- &pp - Member's profile picture

> *Media:* Image/video-inu reply ittu OR message-il URL add cheyyan

Details-inu: https://levanter-delta.vercel.app/
greetings.goodbye_not_set:

goodbye Bye &mention! Thanks for being with us

Pinne upayogikkuka: goodbye on

setschedule.usage:
> *Udaharanam :*
- setschedule jid,min-hour-day-month (24 hour format, day and month optional)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 9-9-13-8
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10 (daily 10 am message ayakkuka)
- setschedule 91987654321@s.whatsapp.net, 0-10, once (10 am message one time ayakkuka)
setschedule.desc: Specified time-il auto message ayakkuka. Target JID(s) and time thanne ittu. Schedule cheyyan vendi message-inu reply ittu.
setschedule.no_reply: Schedule cheyyan vendi message-inu reply ittu.

delschedule.desc: Target JID and time specify cheythu scheduled message delete cheyan or ellaa scheduled messages remove cheyan.

setstatus.usage: Udaharanam: setstatus jid,jid,jid,... OR setstatus contact
setstatus.desc: Specific contacts or imported contacts-inu WhatsApp status set cheyan. Status set cheyyan vendi message-inu reply ittu.
setstatus.reply_required: Status set cheyyan vendi message-inu reply ittu.

scstatus.usage:
Udaharanam:
- scstatus jid,jid,jid,...|min-hour-day-month (day and month optional)
- scstatus contact|min-hour-day-month
- scstatus delete all|min-hour-day-month
- scstatus list
scstatus.desc: Specified time-il WhatsApp status schedule cheyan. 'contact' use cheythu imported contacts-inu or specific JIDs thanne ittu.
scstatus.reply_required: Status schedule cheyyan vendi message-inu reply ittu.

antispam.desc: Configurable levels-ulla antispam protection manage cheyan
antispam.disabled_status:
ğŸ“Š *Antispam Status*

ğŸ”´ Disabled

Protection enable cheyyan vendi `antispam on` upayogikkuka
antispam.deactivated:
âš ï¸ *Antispam Protection Disabled*

Spam detection ippol OFF aanu
antispam.invalid_level: âŒ Level thettaanu. Upayogam: low, medium, high
antispam.help:
ğŸ“– *Antispam Help*

*Commands:*
â€¢ `antispam on` - Enable (default: medium)
â€¢ `antispam off` - Disable
â€¢ `antispam <low/medium/high>` - Sensitivity maattuka
â€¢ `antispam <warn/delete/kick>` - Action maattuka
â€¢ `antispam info` - Ippolulla settings kanan

*Levels:*
â€¢ Low - Relaxed (active groups)
â€¢ Medium - Balanced (suggested)
â€¢ High - Strict (problem groups)
